pullRequest.title: LocoIO decoder definition
pullRequest.bodyText:
SV1 decoder file for LocoIO family of boards.
Handles specifics for 16 port LocoIO Legacy 1.35, HDL 1.36-1.53, LocoBooster v3-5, LocoRCD(2) and LocoServo boards.
To make their particular features work, I had to expand the SplitVal class to handle 3 XXVX-style masks.
Added several null checks to assist coding new decoders without crashing Java too often.
Included in this PR are some IDE flagged optimizations to related classes.
Complexity on Port pane for now useful to review operation. Hardest part was to handle 2 types of port address stored in the same 3 CVs. Mostly handled via the Mode (port operation) combo box.
Tested with my hardware reading/writing (tiny bits only) using POM on layout. Don't own an RCD or LocoServo so if you do, please test and report.
All basics in place, some future TODOs marked in xml comments. Will add some instructions below.
